text: Adam Czartoryski may refer to: * Adam Kazimierz Czartoryski (1734–1823), Polish nobleman and man of letters * Adam Jerzy Czartoryski (1770–1861), Polish nobleman and minister of the Russian Empire * Adam Ludwik Czartoryski (1872–1937), Polish nobleman, landowner, and patron of the arts * Adam Karol Czartoryski (born 1940), Polish-Spanish aristocrat * Adam Michał Czartoryski (1906–1998), Polish noble
title: Adam Czartoryski
